alert.note: Alert for Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:19AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central McIntosh, eastern Okmulgee and northwestern Muskogee Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 418 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Bald Hill to 7 miles south of Dewar. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Okmulgee... Eufaula... Checotah... Morris... Dewar... Schulter... Taft... Boynton... Grayson... Council Hill... Hoffman... Stidham... Bald Hill... Vivian... Lake Eufaula State Park... Raiford... Wainwright... Hitchita... Jamesville... Pierce... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 239 and 264. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
